snippet: When the photographer Theo Zierock looked beyond the excitement of horse racing at Aqueduct Racetrack in Queens, he found a building populated by lonely old men.
abstract: Photographer Theo Zierock documents Aqueduct Racetrack in Queens.
lead_paragraph: When the photographer Theo Zierock looked beyond the excitement of horse racing at Aqueduct Racetrack in Queens, he found a building populated by lonely old men.

headline.print_headline: Where Horses Race, but No One Wins
headline.main: Photographs at Aqueduct Racetrack: Where Horses Race, but No One Wins
